content: lily please obey the copyright laws if you want to share please send them here thanks enjoy the pattern if you plan to make and sell these would you please attach a hang tag with j van wieren designer materials needed for one size 30 crochet cotton size 10 crochet hook cloth covered wire 18 inch lengths size 28 or 32 the smallest you can find or 4 strands of crochet cotton this will be referred to as popcorn in the directions won t hold as stiffly but a good option if you want it completely washable stamens for center you can use yellow beads on green wire or buy them ready made make six petals fold over wire so that you have 1 6# side and 1 12 side join thread at fold work 35 single_crochet over wire chain 2 turn row 1 working in back loops the pattern goes 7 single_crochet 7 half_double_crochet 5 double_crochet 5 treble_crochet 5dc 2 half_double_crochet 4 single_crochet chain 3 working in front loops work 4 single_crochet 2 half_double_crochet 5 double_crochet 5 treble_crochet 5 double_crochet 7 half_double_crochet 7 single_crochet chain 2 turn row 2 working thru both loops work pattern as follows 8 half_double_crochet 20 double_crochet 7 single_crochet chain 1 single_crochet in chain 3 chain 1 7 single_crochet 20 double_crochet 8 half_double_crochet chain 2 turn row 3 work half_double_crochet in each st around assembly when assembling make sure the right side is facing center insert stamen and twist wire tightly curve petals outward copyright by jill van wieren 6/20/2000
